org.monstercraft.irc.wrappers
Class IRCChannel

java.lang.Object
  org.monstercraft.irc.wrappers.IRCChannel

public class IRCChannel
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates an IRC channel to join.

Author:
fletch_to_99

Constructor Detail

IRCChannel

public IRCChannel(IRCServer server,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean showJoinLeave,
                  boolean autoJoin,
                  boolean defaultChannel,
                  java.lang.String channel,
                  ChatType type,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> opCommands,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> voiceCommands,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> userCommands)
Creates an IRCChannel to join.

Parameters:
server - The parent Server.
password - The password to the channel, if any;
showJoinLeave - The option to show leave/join messages.
autoJoin - The option to automatically connect to the server.
defaultChannel - Weither the channel is defaulted with the irc say command.
channel - The channel to join.
type - The channel type.
opCommands - The list of commands IRC ops can use.
voiceCommands - The list of commands IRC voices can use.
userCommands - The list of commands IRC users can use.

IRCChannel

public IRCChannel(IRCServer server,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean showJoinLeave,
                  boolean autoJoin,
                  boolean defaultChannel,
                  java.lang.String channel,
                  java.lang.String heroChatChannel,
                  ChatType type,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> opCommands,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> voiceCommands,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> userCommands)
Creates an IRCChannel to join.

Parameters:
server - The parent Server.
password - The password to the channel, if any;
showJoinLeave - The option to show leave/join messages.
autoJoin - The option to automatically connect to the server.
defaultChannel - Weither the channel is defaulted with the irc say command.
channel - The channel to join.
heroChatChannel - The herochat channel to pass chat to.
type - The channel type.
opCommands - The list of commands IRC ops can use.
voiceCommands - The list of commands IRC voices can use.
userCommands - The list of commands IRC users can use.
